lead_paragraph: San Diego finished the first round of interviews for its head-coaching vacancy yesterday when the Chargers met with Gary Gibbs, the New Orleans defensive coordinator.General Manager A. J. Smith and the team’s president, Dean Spanos — who fired Marty Schottenheimer last Monday — have met with six candidates.
